Articles.Content:
Spanner's Boomsticks Continued

A long time ago SpannerMonkey gave me permission to become the maintainer of his BD Armory addon Spanner's Boomsticks. i have finally fulfilled my promise and updated the mod to the latest edition of KSP and BDArmory. unfotunatly not every item could be salvaged but what is here now works with the newest version of BDArmory. No new content will be added but i will continue to maintain and bugfix.

original thread here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94830-WIP-%28Important-news%29Spanners-Boomsticks-Parts-to-complement-BD-Armory

Download link kerbalstuff: https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1193/Spanner%27s%20Boomsticks%20Continued

NOTE: this continuation is made with the explicit permission of the original mod creator SpannerMonkey. I am the only on authorized to maintain this continuation.

License:

All Rights Reserved

Nice! Can't wait to get home & try it out!

- - - Updated - - -

YAY first post

:D:D:D THANK YOU!!!

Couldn't wait for this to be released!

TURRETS WERE FIXED?

oh god i love that phalanx

Nice. If it's not too much of an imposition, could we get a list Parts that are kept or ditched. I remember this mod and can't tell you how much I appreciate the effort you put into all of your mods and maintaining this one.
Mind listing what you got rid of?

Yay!!!!! I missed Spanners SOOOOOO Much

I'm going to play with this so much

All right i only have one tiny bug...

The "UD4MinigunBallturret CIWS" It's Firing radius is reversed, SO instead of swiveling and moving along its channel, It swivels and moves on the underside of the turret and usually blows up my ship XD

It is not a massive Issue but I thought I would mention it, Other than that Everything looks good
